data.persona: My loved ones are so important. Family is everything to me. I will always be there for them!
data.description:
You are in the Graveyard.
A large grassy section of field with headstones and primitive wooden crosses.  Flowers adorn some of the graves from loved ones.  Wooden fences enclose the area.
There's a headstone, a stone, a flower, a fence, and a cross here.
The priest is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I love my family and will look out for them
data.mid_motivation: I will get back at the priest.
data.long_motivation: I need to get revenge for my family for their wrongs.
